00022  * @author Cale Scholl / calvinss4

00025 #include "tcyc_input.h"
00026 
00027 #include "main.h"          // for TCYC_GetTargetPlayer, TCYC_GetTargetPowerupSlot
00028 #include "tcyc_menu.h"     // for TCYC_MenuPause
00029 #include "Player.h"        // for Player
00030 #include "Options.h"       // for Options
00031 #include "libwiigui/gui.h" // for GuiTrigger
00032 #include "PowerupUtils.h"  // for PowerupUtils
00033 
00034 extern Player *g_players;       ///< the player instances
00035 extern int g_tcycMenu;          ///< the current menu state
00036 extern Options *g_options;      ///< the global options
00037 extern GuiTrigger userInput[4]; ///< user input
00038 extern bool g_isClassicMode;    ///< classic mode
00039 
00040 // helper routines
00041 static void _HandlePowerups(int plyrIdx);
00042 static void _HandleLeftRight(int plyrIdx, bool isEditMode = false);
00043 static void _HandleDown(int plyrIdx);
00044 
00045 void TCYC_ProcessInput()
00046 {
00047   // Allow any player to pause the game.
00048   if (PausePressedAnyPlayer())
00049   {
00050     TCYC_MenuPause("Pause");
00051     if (g_tcycMenu != TCYC_MENU_NONE)
00052       return;
00053 
00054     // This is necessary so that powerups don't expire as soon as we unpause 
00055     // the game.
00056     PowerupUtils::ResetPowerupStartTimes();
00057   }
00058 
00059   for (int i = 0; i < g_options->players; ++i)
00060   {
00061     Player &player = g_players[i];
00062     TetrisPiece &piece = player.currPiece;
00063 
00064     if (player.gameData.isDead)
00065       continue;
00066 
00067     // POWERUPS:
00068     _HandlePowerups(i);
00069 
00070     // ROTATE PIECE:
00071     int rot = piece.GetRotation();
00072 
00073     if (ROTATE_PRESSED(i))
00074     {
00075       ++rot;
00076       if (rot > 3)
00077         rot = 0;
00078       player.RotateCurrentPiece(rot);
00079     }
00080     else if (ROTATE2_PRESSED(i))
00081     {
00082       --rot;
00083       if (rot < 0)
00084         rot = 3;
00085       player.RotateCurrentPiece(rot);
00086     }
00087 
00088     // LEFT, RIGHT:
00089     _HandleLeftRight(i);
00090 
00091     // DOWN:
00092     _HandleDown(i);
00093 
00094     // DROP:
00095     bool isAccelPressed = ACCEL_Z_PRESSED(i) && piece.IsAccelEnabled();
00096 
00097     if (DROP_PRESSED(i) || (player.isShakeEnabled && isAccelPressed))
00098     {
00099       while (player.MovePiece(DOWN));
00100       player.DoMovement();
00101     }
00102   }
00103 }
00104 
00105 void TCYC_ProcessEditModeInput()
00106 {
00107   for (int i = 0; i < g_options->players; ++i)
00108   {
00109     _HandleLeftRight(i, true);
00110   }
00111 }
00112 
00113 bool PausePressedAnyPlayer()
00114 {
00115   for (int i = 0; i < g_options->players; ++i)
00116   {
00117     if (PAUSE_PRESSED(i))
00118       return true;
00119   }
00120 
00121   return false;
00122 }
00123 
00124 void _HandlePowerups(int plyrIdx)
00125 {
00126   Player &player = g_players[plyrIdx];
00127 
00128   // Get the target powerup slot.
00129   int targetSlot = -1;
00130   if (userInput[plyrIdx].wpad->ir.valid)
00131   {
00132     targetSlot = TCYC_GetTargetPowerupSlot(plyrIdx, 
00133                                            userInput[plyrIdx].wpad->ir.x, 
00134                                            userInput[plyrIdx].wpad->ir.y);
00135   }
00136 
00137   if (GRAB_HELD(plyrIdx))
00138   {
00139     if (!player.gameData.isGrabHeld)
00140     {
00141       player.gameData.isGrabHeld = true;
00142       if (targetSlot >= 0)
00143       {
00144         // The player grabbed a powerup this frame.
00145         player.gameData.grabbedPowerup = player.gameData.powerupQueue[targetSlot];
00146         player.gameData.powerupQueue[targetSlot] = NULL;
00147 
00148         // If we're in this player's powerup zone and grab was pressed this 
00149         // frame, then ignore all other button presses.
00150         WPAD_Data(plyrIdx)->btns_d = 0;
00151       }
00152     }
00153   }
00154   else
00155   {
00156     player.gameData.isGrabHeld = false;
00157     if (player.gameData.grabbedPowerup)
00158     {
00159       // The player dropped a powerup. If we're in this player's powerup 
00160       // zone then try to put the powerup back.
00161       if (targetSlot >= 0)
00162       {
00163         int emptySlot = player.GetPowerupQueueSlot();
00164         if (emptySlot >= 0)
00165         {
00166           player.QueuePowerup(player.gameData.grabbedPowerup, emptySlot);
00167         }
00168         else
00169         {
00170           // play a buzz sound for negative reinforcement
00171           PowerupUtils::GetInvalidTargetSound()->Play();
00172         }
00173       }
00174       // Otherwise try to use the powerup on the target player.
00175       else
00176       {
00177         int targetPlayer = -1;
00178         if (userInput[plyrIdx].wpad->ir.valid)
00179           targetPlayer = TCYC_GetTargetPlayer(userInput[plyrIdx].wpad->ir.x);
00180 
00181         bool success = false;
00182         if (targetPlayer >= 0)
00183           success = player.gameData.grabbedPowerup->Initiate(targetPlayer);
00184 
00185         if (!success)
00186         {
00187           // If we couldn't use the powerup then try to put it back.
00188           int emptySlot = player.GetPowerupQueueSlot();
00189           if (emptySlot >= 0)
00190             player.QueuePowerup(player.gameData.grabbedPowerup, emptySlot);
00191 
00192           // play a buzz sound for negative reinforcement
00193           PowerupUtils::GetInvalidTargetSound()->Play();
00194         }
00195       }
00196 
00197       player.gameData.grabbedPowerup = NULL;
00198     }
00199   }
00200 }
00201 
00202 void _HandleLeftRight(int plyrIdx, bool isEditMode)
00203 {
00204   Player &player = g_players[plyrIdx];
00205 
00206   // When the analog stick is held in a given direction, only register a 
00207   // press for that direction every 'leftRightTimeout' frames.
00208   static const int leftRightTimeout = 5;
00209 
00210   bool isLeftPressed  = LEFT_PRESSED(plyrIdx);
00211   bool isRightPressed = RIGHT_PRESSED(plyrIdx);
00212 
00213   if (player.gameData.powerupData.isReverse)
00214     SWAP(isLeftPressed, isRightPressed);
00215 
00216   if (!isLeftPressed && !isRightPressed)
00217   {
00218     player.gameData.isLeftRightHeld = false;
00219     player.gameData.leftRightCtr = 0;
00220   }
00221   else if (!player.gameData.isLeftRightHeld 
00222            || player.gameData.leftRightCtr > leftRightTimeout)
00223   {
00224     player.gameData.isLeftRightHeld = true;
00225 
00226     if (player.gameData.leftRightCtr > leftRightTimeout)
00227       player.gameData.leftRightCtr = 0;
00228 
00229     if (isLeftPressed) 
00230     {
00231       if (!isEditMode)
00232       {
00233         if (player.rotation != ROTATE_PIECE && !g_isClassicMode)
00234         {
00235           if (player.MovePlayfield(LEFT))
00236             player.IncrementCycle();
00237         }
00238         else
00239         {
00240           player.MovePiece(LEFT);
00241         }
00242       }
00243       else
00244       {
00245         player.IncrementCycle();
00246       }
00247     }
00248 
00249     if (isRightPressed)
00250     {
00251       if (!isEditMode)
00252       {
00253         if (player.rotation != ROTATE_PIECE && !g_isClassicMode)
00254         {
00255           if (player.MovePlayfield(RIGHT))
00256             player.DecrementCycle();
00257         }
00258         else
00259         {
00260           player.MovePiece(RIGHT);
00261         }
00262       }
00263       else
00264       {
00265         player.DecrementCycle();
00266       }
00267     }
00268   }
00269   else
00270   {
00271     player.gameData.leftRightCtr++;
00272   }
00273 }
00274 
00275 void _HandleDown(int plyrIdx)
00276 {
00277   Player &player = g_players[plyrIdx];
00278 
00279   // When the analog stick is held in the down direction, only register a 
00280   // press for that direction every 'downTimeout' frames.
00281   static const int downTimeout = 1; // ==> every other frame
00282 
00283   bool isDownPressed = DOWN_PRESSED(plyrIdx);
00284 
00285   if (!isDownPressed)
00286   {
00287     player.gameData.isDownHeld = false;
00288     player.gameData.downCtr = 0;
00289   }
00290   else if (!player.gameData.isDownHeld 
00291            || player.gameData.downCtr > downTimeout)
00292   {
00293     player.gameData.isDownHeld = true;
00294 
00295     if (player.gameData.downCtr > downTimeout)
00296       player.gameData.downCtr = 0;
00297 
00298     player.DoMovement();
00299   }
00300   else
00301   {
00302     player.gameData.downCtr++;
00303   }
00304 
00305   // Move the piece down every 'speed' frames.
00306   if (player.gameData.frame 
00307       && player.gameData.frame % player.gameData.speed == 0)
00308   {
00309     player.DoMovement();
00310   }
00311 }
